backend/main.mo: Defines core actor types for sessions, documents, channels, messages, file/image references, and includes blob storage mixin but no logic due to truncation.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styling files.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Regression test plan detailing scenarios for verifying player document file/image uploads, error handling, and preventing regressions in session document uploads.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that initializes theme mode from localStorage and loads the React app root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling Internet Identity auth, profile setup, session restoration, logout, and conditional rendering of Lobby or Session pages with global UI scaling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI with reload and data‑clear options when an unhandled error occurs.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat view handling message input, auto‑scrolling, roll commands, image uploads, and posting messages to a channel.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, reply context, image support, and long‑press handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments with add/delete functionality and user identity checks.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses content for embedded file markers and renders text, images, or downloadable file attachments.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Document editor supporting content editing, file uploads, image insertion, preview mode, and saving via backend actor.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog for selecting, validating, and uploading an image with an optional title.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Full editor view for player documents with saving, visibility control, file uploads, and image insertion.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Avatar component showing an image or user initials with size options and fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: User profile picture uploader with validation, progress tracking, and removal controls.
frontend/src/components/profile/QuickCha: Dialog to set a temporary display name and avatar stored locally for quick chat use.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting session channels with validation and backend calls.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Provides dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking documents tied to a session using actor calls and UI modals.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Implements session export and import controls with file handling, confirmation dialogs, and error reporting.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Contains dialogs to create, rename, and delete members' channels via session data mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Provides dialogs and menus to create, rename, delete, and manage visibility of player-owned documents using related hooks.
Displays a list of a player's documents with ownership info and allows creating or selecting documents within a session.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting session documents using related hooks.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar component for channel navigation, profile access, UI scale settings, and collapsible layout.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings page for theme, background, nickname, templates, and resetting user preferences.
frontend/src/components/settings/UIScale: Popover allowing users to adjust and reset UI scale via slider or numeric input.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, session info, and document content.
Context provider managing user preferences with persistence, theme application, and reset support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, with query invalidation on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting document comments with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Hooks for listing, retrieving, and uploading document file references with validation and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing and adding images to session or player documents, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider to manage login, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Supplies hooks to list, fetch, create, edit, rename, delete, and update visibility of player documents using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Defines a simple polling hook that repeatedly invokes a callback on an interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the PreferencesContext for compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickChatProfile.t: Manages loading, saving, and clearing a local quick chat profile with simple state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Aggregates session-related queries for session info, channels, members channels, and messages, plus related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: Provides hooks to list, fetch, create, edit, rename, and delete session documents with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user's display name with fallback to shortened principal when unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Implements hooks to fetch and update user profiles and profile pictures using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and layout styles for chat and session pages. Includes mobile scrolling fixes and chat bubble styling.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific app-related localStorage keys and clears sessionStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Provides utilities to create, parse, insert, and remove file markers embedded in text content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Provides utilities to create, parse, insert, and remove image markers embedded in text content.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Handles saving, loading, clamping, and resetting user UI preferences in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/quickChatProfileStorage: Manages loading, validating, saving, and clearing a quick-chat profile including avatar data URLs.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates basic dice roll command patterns and returns errors for malformed input.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses versioned JSON session export files with validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, loads, and clears basic session context (ID, nickname, host flag) in localStorage.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session templates stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into human-readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Renders lobby UI for hosting or joining sessions, handles form state, template application, and session creation.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Main session view managing channel selection, document viewing, and UI state for chat and documents. Integrates multiple hooks to load session data and switch between channels and documents.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app features, issues, and pending requests for chat layout fixes and auto-scroll behavior.
